title: Symantec Selects Perspectium for ServiceNow Cloud Data Integration
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 10:35 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Perspectium Corporation 
SAN DIEGO, Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Perspectium, the innovator in redefining information movement methods within cloud and traditional applications, today announced that Symantec has selected Perspectium for their enterprise integration framework. Perspectium Replicator integrates data within Symantec's ITSM platform (ServiceNow) in real time. 
Symantec is a global leader in providing security, storage and systems management solutions to help their customers - from consumers and small businesses to the largest global organizations -secure and manage their information against more risks and more points, more completely and efficiently than any other company. 
Donald Waldron, Symantec's Manager of IT Service Management said, "In today's IT environments, the need for information in real time and at your fingertips is paramount. Manual methods of moving information are simply not tolerable. We chose Perspectium because of their low impact, high output message broker service, which facilitates end to end integration of our cloud and in house applications. The overall effect is an excellent customer experience based on information being delivered accurately and in real time." 
David Loo, Perspectium founder and CEO said, "Perspectium solutions focus on high usability in front of powerful capabilities. We are fortunate to have a customer like Symantec recognize our values and invest in technology that can sustain them through change." 
About PerspectiumFounded in 2013 by David Loo (Founding Developer at ServiceNow), Perspectium addresses the "data movement" phenomenon being experienced in the cloud. Perspectium extends Cloud and Native Application platforms with a straight-forward standardized integration offering. We solve data integration, monitoring, and replication challenges with minimal impact and a massive data throughput capability.
